name: BFR012
notes: Erection of apartment building to comprise 45 dwellings and associated semi-basement car parking, access and landscaping following demolition and clearance of the existing building 'Rivershill House' . Flat site with vacant office building in a central urban location, predominantly surrounded by residential. The site is within the Core Commercial Area and Central Conservation Area.
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR013
notes: The site is a flat, car park site associated wioth Cheltenham Town Football Club. developed, site within the urban area containing pre-fabricated bungalows. The surrounding area is predominantly residential with commercial / employment uses to the west and Cheltenham Town Football Club east.
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR014
notes: Alterations to facilitate conversion of existing building and associated stable block to 14no. residential units (2no. one bedroom apartments, 9no. two bedroom apartments, 2no. three bedroom apartments and 1no. three bedroom dwelling). This is a flat, developed, site within a predominantly residential area and adjacent to Pittville Park and within the Central Conservation area.
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR015
notes: This site includes a neighbourhood centre, residential and associated garages. Only part of site permissioned: Erection of 3no. dwellings and associated hard and soft landscaping.
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR018
site-address: Former Post Office Vehicle Depot, Carlton Street
notes: Erection of 6no dwellings and 2no offices (following demolition of existing building on site) (application in effect to renew Planning Permissions ref 06/01919/FUL approved 02.03.2007 and 10/00748/TIME approved 06.07.2010). Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR025
notes: Change of use from Class D1 to 5no. one bedroom apartments, with associated external alterations. Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR026
notes: Application to extend time limit for implementation of planning permission 10/00869/OUT (erection of 5 apartments following demolition of existing building). Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR027
notes: Erection of 2no. ground floor office units with 6 no. residential apartments above ( resubmission of previously approved application ref 07/00378/OUT). Demolition of existing building on site. Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR028
notes: Allocated in Pre-Submission Cheltenham Plan. Erection of a mixed use development comprising; 5,792sqm (gross external floor space) of class A1 food store, 739sqm (gross) of class A1 shops and 19sqm (gross) of class A2 within atrium space and 336sqm (gross) of class A3 (customer restaurant); multi-storey car park providing 634 spaces over 5 floors (300 spaces for public use and 334 spaces for food store customers); 143 no. residential units within a mix of 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom houses and flats, (57 units to be affordable) with associated 143 car parking spaces at ground and basement level; creation of new public open spaces; provision of new parking bays for buses and erection of a passenger information kiosk and waiting room; associated other operations to facilitate the mixed use development including alterations to and from the existing highway for vehicular, pedestrian and cycle access. All following the demolition of existing buildings and other built structures on the site.

name: BFR029
notes: Demolition of existing building and the construction of a four storey building for residential use together with three town houses and associated parking. Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR030
notes: Demolition of existing building and construction of a new mixed use building to provide a ground floor retail unit and 12 no. residential units (comprising 5no. one bed and 7no. two bed apartments). Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

name: BFR031
notes: Erection of a building comprising shop unit and 2 bed flat at ground floor level, 2no x 2bed apartments on first and second floors, 2no x1 bed apartments on third floor. Provision of car parking facilities and a single storey building for storage of waste and bicycles. Site has planning permission, construction not started April 2017
ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
